# ğŸš€ **n8n Market Research Automation Workflow**

## â° 1. **Trigger & Scheduling**

## ğŸŒğŸ’» 2. **Crawling & Filtering**

### **Nodes:**

* `ğŸŒ Crawl TechCrunch (FireCrawl)` *(HTTP Request)*
* `ğŸ§  Filter Relevant Articles` *(Code)*

### ğŸ” What these nodes do:

#### ğŸŒ **Crawl TechCrunch (FireCrawl)**

* FireCrawlì˜ APIì— **POST** ìš”ì²­ì„ ì‚¬ìš©í•©ë‹ˆë‹¤.
* Inputs:

  * `url`: ëŒ€ìƒ ì‚¬ì´íŠ¸ (ì˜ˆ: `https://techcrunch.com`)
  * `crawl_type`: `"scrape"`
  * `extract_article`: `true`
* Retrieves:

  * `title`, `content`, `author`, `published_at`

#### ğŸ§  **Filter Relevant Articles**

* `Code` ë…¸ë“œë¥¼ ì‚¬ìš©í•˜ì—¬ ê¸°ì‚¬ê°€ ê´€ë ¨ëœì§€ í™•ì¸í•©ë‹ˆë‹¤.
* `"AI"`, `"machine learning"`, `"startup"` ê°™ì€ í‚¤ì›Œë“œë¥¼ ë§¤ì¹­í•©ë‹ˆë‹¤.
* ë„ë©”ì¸ì— ì¤‘ìš”í•œ ê¸°ì‚¬ë§Œ í•„í„°ë§í•©ë‹ˆë‹¤.

ğŸ“„ **Sample Code:**

```javascript
const keywords = ['AI', 'machine learning', 'startup', 'generative'];
const results = [];

for (const item of items) {
  const title = item.json.article?.title?.toLowerCase() || '';
  const content = item.json.article?.content?.toLowerCase() || '';

  const isRelevant = keywords.some(keyword =>
    title.includes(keyword.toLowerCase()) ||
    content.includes(keyword.toLowerCase())
  );

  if (isRelevant) {
    results.push(item); // keep only relevant articles
  }
}

return results;
```
